definition-item.definition-title: MACHINES OR APPARATUS FOR TREATING HARVESTED FRUIT, VEGETABLES OR FLOWER BULBS IN BULK, NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR; PEELING VEGETABLES OR FRUIT IN BULK; APPARATUS FOR PREPARING ANIMAL FEEDING- STUFFS (machines for cutting straw or fodder A01F29/00; disintegrating, e.g. shredding, B02C; severing, e.g. cutting, splitting, slicing B26B, B26D)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Apparatus for post-harvest processing of fruit, vegetables or flower bulbs in bulk, or on an industrial scale (A23N1/00 - A23N15/00); Apparatus for preparing fodder for feeding animals (A23N17/00)
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for cutting straw or fodder

definition-item.definition-title: Machines or apparatus for extracting juice (preparation of non-alcoholic beverages, e.g. by adding ingredients to fruit or vegetable juices, A23L2/00; apparatus for making beverages A47J31/00 {; centrifuges B04B}; extracting presses B30B)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Preparation of non-alcoholic beverages, e.g. by adding ingredients to fruit or vegetable juices

section-body.paragraph-text: Apparatus for post-harvest processing of fruit, vegetables or flower bulbs in bulk, or on an industrial scale (A23N1/00 - A23N15/00); Apparatus for preparing fodder for feeding animals (A23N17/00)

definition-item.definition-title: {especially for citrus fruits}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines or apparatus for extracting juice in bulk, or on an industrial scale, dedicated for citrus fruit
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Extraction processes of juice from citrus fruit

definition-item.definition-title: Machines for coring or stoning fruit, characterised by their feeding device (A23N4/00 takes precedence {; kitchen devices for stoning fruit A47J25/00})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for coring or stoning fruit in bulk, or on an industrial scale, characterised by their feeding device
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group:
(source: Fig. 4 of EP0056790 A1)
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for coring or stoning characterised by their stoning or seed removing device

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: with feeder-drums

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: with endless feeder-belts

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: with feeder-tables

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Conveyors comprising a cyclically-moving, e.g. reciprocating, carrier or impeller which is disengaged from the load during the return part of its movement

definition-item.definition-title: Machines for stoning fruit or removing seed-containing sections from fruit, characterised by their stoning or removing device (for peeling fruit and removing seed-containing sections A23N7/08; domestic devices for stoning fruit A47J23/00, for coring fruit A47J25/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for stoning fruit or removing seed-containing sections from fruit in bulk, or on an industrial scale, characterised by their stoning or removing device
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus for peeling fruit and removing seed-containing sections for coring fruit

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus for peeling fruit and removing seed-containing sections
Arrangements for guiding hand cutting tools in general
Details of apparatus for cutting, cutting-out, stamping-out, punching, perforating, or severing by means other than cutting
Punching tools or dies, cutting-out knives or dies in general

definition-item.definition-title: for stoning fruit

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for stoning fruit in bulk, or on an industrial scale, characterised by their stoning device
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group:
(source: Fig. 1 of US5992310 A)
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Peeling fruit and removing seed-containing sections for coring fruit

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Peeling fruit and removing seed-containing sections
Details of apparatus for cutting, cutting-out, stamping-out, punching, perforating, or severing by means other than cutting

definition-item.definition-title: for coring fruit {(for household appliances B26B)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for removing seed-containing sections from fruit in bulk, or on an industrial scale, characterised by their removing device, and not suitable for stoning
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this group:
(source: Fig. 1 of US4416195 A)
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Peeling fruit and removing seed-containing sections for coring fruit

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Peeling fruit and removing seed-containing sections
Details of apparatus for cutting, cutting-out, stamping-out, punching, perforating, or severing by means other than cutting

definition-item.definition-title: Machines for hulling, husking or cracking nuts {(household nutcrackers A47J43/26)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for hulling, husking or cracking nuts in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {for palmnuts (A23N5/002 and A23N5/08 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for hulling, husking or cracking of in particular palmnuts in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for removing fleshy or fibrous hulls of nuts

definition-item.definition-title: {for chestnuts (A23N5/002 and A23N5/08 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for hulling, husking or cracking chestnuts in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for removing fleshy or fibrous hulls of nuts

definition-item.definition-title: {for almonds (A23N5/002 and A23N5/08 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for hulling, husking for almonds etc. in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for removing fleshy or fibrous hulls of nuts

section-body.paragraph-text: other nuts with like processes: cashew nuts

definition-item.definition-title: for removing fleshy or fibrous hulls of nuts (for peanuts A23N5/01)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for removing fleshy or fibrous hulls of nuts in bulk or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for removing the hull from peanuts

definition-item.definition-title: Peeling vegetables or fruit (devices for skinning onions A23N15/08; {peeling by non-mechanical means A23P}; peeling machines of the household type A47J17/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for peeling vegetables or fruit in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Peeling machines of the household type

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Splitting layers from work by peeling off
outer skin of fruit and vegetables

definition-item.definition-title: {Peeling pinaeapples (A23N7/005 and A23N7/01 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for peeling pineapples, in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Peeling machines of the household type

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Peeling potatoes, apples or similarly shaped vegetables or fruit ({A23N7/005 and} A23N7/01 take precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for peeling potatoes, apples or similarly shaped vegetables or fruit in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Peeling machines of the household type

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Peeling asparagus ({A23N7/005 and} A23N7/01 take precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for peeling asparagus in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Peeling machines of the household type

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Driving mechanisms

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Driving mechanisms used in machines for peeling vegetables or fruit in bulk, or on an industrial scale
Cutting devices in general B26D
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Peeling machines of the household type

definition-item.definition-title: Removing pith from stems

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Apparatus for removing pith from stems
This place does not cover:
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: The soft internal tissue of a plant part; esp. a central cylinder of parenchyma in a stem or root

definition-item.definition-title: Machines for cleaning, blanching, drying or roasting fruits or vegetables, e.g. coffee, cocoa, nuts (methods for treating, e.g. roasting, coffee or cocoa, A23F, A23G; cleaning, e.g. washing, or drying grain B02B1/00; separating solids from solids for cleaning B07B; cleaning in general B08B; heating devices per se, see the relevant classes, e.g. F24; drying machines in general F26B)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for cleaning, blanching, drying or roasting fruits or vegetables, e.g. coffee, cocoa, nuts in bulk, or on an industrial scale
Devices and methods for treating, e.g. roasting, coffee or cocoa, A23F, A23G, as far as they also allow processing other matter of plant origin
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cleaning, e.g. washing, or drying grain
Separating solids from solids for cleaning
Heating devices per se, see the relevant classes

definition-item.definition-title: for washing or blanching (A23N12/06 takes precedence; blanching methods A23B7/06)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for washing or blanching fruits or vegetables on an industrial scale; with or without washing aids, such as brushes etc.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Domestic devices for washing vegetables or the like

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Washing granular, powdered or lumpy materials or wet separating in general

definition-item.definition-title: for blanching

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for blanching (exclusively)
Documents relating to blanching methods in A23B7/06 may also comprise claims to blanching machines
This place does not cover:
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: short term heating for inactivating enzymes, removing gas inclusions, etc.

definition-item.definition-title: for drying or roasting (A23N12/06 takes precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for drying or roasting of fruit and vegetables in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for washing or blanching, combined with subsequent drying
Beverage-making apparatus with incorporated grinding or roasting means for coffee
Coffee mills combined with roasting devices

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Machines or apparatus for other treatment of fruits or vegetables for human purposes; Machines or apparatus for topping or skinning flower bulbs {(treatment of coffee, other than drying or roasting A23F; treatment of cocoa A23G1/02)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for processing fruit or vegetables, as defined therein

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Treatment of tea or coffee, other than drying or roasting

section-body.paragraph-text: Machines or apparatus for other treatment of fruits or vegetables for human purposes in bulk, or on an industrial scale, not provided for in other subclasses (A23N15/02 - A23N15/06);
Machines or apparatus for topping or skinning flower bulbs in bulk, or on an industrial scale (A23N15/08)

definition-item.definition-title: for stemming, piercing, or stripping fruit {(for household appliances A47J21/00)}; Removing sprouts of potatoes

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Machines for stemming, piercing, or stripping fruit in bulk, or on an industrial scale; Removing sprouts of potatoes
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Devices for topping fruit or vegetables (topping onions A23N15/08)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices for topping fruit or vegetables in bulk, or on an industrial scale
Cutting in general B26D
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cutting fruit or vegetables in general

definition-item.definition-title: Devices for other treatment of fruit, e.g. marking, maturing, polishing

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices for other post-harvest treatment of fruit e.g. marking, maturing, polishing in bulk, or on an industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for other processing fruit or vegetables, as defined therein

section-body.paragraph-text: Only to be used when none of the other classes in A23N, A01D applies, and the document is directed to processing fruit or vegetables only
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: providing the surface with a smoother and, if possible, shiny appearance, in particular by polishing aids such as cloths etc.

definition-item.definition-title: Devices for topping or skinning onions or flower bulbs

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices for topping or skinning onions or flower bulbs in bulk, or on an industrial scale
Cutting in general B26D
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Topping fruit or vegetables in general
Cutting fruit or vegetables in general

definition-item.definition-title: for shelling peas or beans

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices for shelling peas or beans
Combine harvesters: A01D41/00, may comprise shelling devices
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus specially adapted for preparing animal feeding-stuffs {(automatic devices for the distribution of liquid fodder for stock or game A01K5/0216; sucking apparatus for young stock A01K9/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Apparatus specially adapted for preparing animal feeding-stuffs in bulk, or on industrial scale
apparatus for working or shaping of foodstuff in general: A23P
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Preparation methods for animal feeding-stuffs, and their products:

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Automatic devices for the distribution of liquid fodder for stock or game

definition-item.definition-title: {by treating with chemicals, e.g. ammoniac, sodium hydroxide (processes A23K10/32)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Apparatus specially adapted for preparing animal feeding-stuffs in bulk, by treating with chemicals, e.g. ammoniac, sodium hydroxide
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {for treating of meat, fish waste or the like}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Apparatus specially adapted for treating of meat, fish waste or the like for preparing animal feeding-stuffs in bulk
Apparatus for processing meat, fish etc. for human consumption: A22C
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Animal feeding stuffs from meat, fish or bones

definition-item.definition-title: {for treating by application of heat, e.g. by means of potato cookers (drying F26B)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Apparatus specially adapted for preparing animal feeding-stuffs with treating by application of heat, e.g. by means of potato cookers
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Preservation of materials to produce animal feeding-stuffs

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Drying and roasting of fruit or vegetables

definition-item.definition-title: {for shaping by moulding, extrusion, pressing, e.g. pellet-mills (processes A23K40/00; presses in general B30B)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Apparatus specially adapted for preparing animal feeding-stuffs with shaping by moulding, extrusion, pressing, e.g. pellet-mills
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Processes for shaping animal foods and their products

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus for shaping or moulding of foodstuff in general

definition-item.definition-title: {for mixing feeding-stuff components}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Apparatus specially adapted for mixing feeding-stuff components in bulk
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fodder distributors with mixers or shredders

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Fodder mashers (household implements for mashing potatoes or other foodstuffs A47J19/04)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Fodder mashers for producing animal foodstuffs in bulk, e.g. in industrial scale
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Household implements for mashing potatoes or other foodstuffs

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
